projectsData.title: Fullstack E-commerce webshop
projectsData.description: Fullstack, fully fuctional and responsive E-commerce webshop. With user and admin dashboard for managing orders, stock, users,... It has shopping cart with integrated Paypal Api for making online payments.

features.name: ReactJS
features.description: decomposing components, context API, hooks and more.

features.name: NextJS
features.description: Setting up project, navigating between pages and data fetching,  dynamic routing, image optimization, SSG and SSR,

features.name: MongoDB and Mongoose
features.description: Save and retrieve data like products, orders and users

features.name: Material UI
features.description: For building responsive website using custom theme, animation, carousel and more.

features.name: SEO
features.description: Dynamic meta tags based on dynamic pages and content.

projectsData.title: Project 2
projectsData.description: The program contains 14 modules, 75+ hours, that are completed in 3-4 month. All modules are filled with interactive coding challenges to ensure that you don't fall off the wagon.
